org.kepler.modulemanager

Interface ModuleManagerEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModuleDownloadProgressMonitor

    public interface ModuleManagerEventListener
    This interface handles event passing from the ModuleDownloader to its clients.
    Author:
    berkley

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void downloadBegin(int totalSize, java.lang.String moduleName)
      update the listener when a download begins
      void downloadEnd()
      update the listener when a download ends
      void unzipBegin(long totalSize, java.lang.String moduleName)
      begin an unzip procedure
      void unzipEnd()
      end an unzip procedure
      void unzipUpdateProgress(long totalSize, int bufferSize, int readCount)
      update the progress on an unzip procedure
      void updateProgress(int totalSize, int bufferSize, int readCount, java.io.InputStream is)
      update the listener on the status of the download

    • Method Detail

      • updateProgress

        void updateProgress(int totalSize,
                    int bufferSize,
                    int readCount,
                    java.io.InputStream is)
        update the listener on the status of the download
        Parameters:
        totalSize - the total size of the transfer. -1 if not known
        bufferSize - the size of each buffered transfer. -1 if this is not a buffered transfer
        readCount - the number of times bufferSize has been read.
        is - the inputStream being read

      • downloadEnd

        void downloadEnd()
        update the listener when a download ends

      • downloadBegin

        void downloadBegin(int totalSize,
                   java.lang.String moduleName)
        update the listener when a download begins
        Parameters:
        totalSize - the total size of the download. -1 if unknown.
        moduleName - the name of the module beginning to download

      • unzipBegin

        void unzipBegin(long totalSize,
                java.lang.String moduleName)
        begin an unzip procedure
        Parameters:
        totalSize - total size of the zip file
        moduleName - the name of the module unzipping

      • unzipEnd

        void unzipEnd()
        end an unzip procedure

      • unzipUpdateProgress

        void unzipUpdateProgress(long totalSize,
                         int bufferSize,
                         int readCount)
        update the progress on an unzip procedure
        Parameters:
        totalSize - total size of the zip file
        bufferSize - size of each buffer in the zip entry
        readCount - number of bufferSize'd buffers that have been read
